ygData.subject: Re: Soulbinders
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there a binder in every city?  Particularly Qeynos? ... lurking ... me. One ... I ve ... activate ... Service.
ygData.messageBody:
Is there a binder in every city? Particularly Qeynos?




--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Chris Talbot" <chris@c...> wrote:
> Worked like a charm. Thanks, Matt and Gina.
>
> Chris
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Matthew Bond [mailto:mattgbond@n...]
> Sent: Friday, July 18, 2003 4:17 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Soulbinders
>
>
> Chris Talbot wrote:
> > Hi, everyone.
> >
> > I'm still fairly new to the group and to EverQuest. I've been
lurking
> > here for a short while. Many things in the game still confuse
me. One
> > is soulbinders. I want to get bound to the Plane of Knowledge.
I've
> > found the soulbinder there, but I can't figure out how to
activate
> > the binding.
> >
> > Can anyone help me out?
>
> target the soulbinder, and /say bind my soul...
>
> Matt
>
>
